about.description:
This package is meant to easily get usage statistics from the users of your
program.

Statistics will be collected but won't be uploaded until the user opts in.
A message will be printed on stderr asking the user to explicitely opt in or
opt out.

name: usagestats
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "usagestats" %}
{% set version = "0.8" %}
{% set sha256 = "20da296e38d5bdae46f119ea7e5703757ac97b9ebf2e6ad5b7a3676146af26f8" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 1
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python
    - requests
    - distro

test:
  imports:
    - usagestats

about:
  home: http://github.com/remram44/usagestats
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: 'Anonymous usage statistics collecter'
  description: |
    This package is meant to easily get usage statistics from the users of your
    program.

    Statistics will be collected but won't be uploaded until the user opts in.
    A message will be printed on stderr asking the user to explicitely opt in or
    opt out.
  dev_url: http://github.com/remram44/usagestats

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - remram44
